name.description: Unique name for the credentials. Must be 1-100 alphanumeric, dash, or underscore characters.

description.description: Optional description of the credentials and their intended use.

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the container registry server. Required for container registry credentials â€” defaults to docker.io).

keys.description: Authentication keys and secrets for the credential provider. Structure varies by provider type.

password.description: GitHub personal access token (classic or fine-grained).

github.description: GitHub credentials for authenticating with GitHub repositories and API.
github.title: GitHubSecurityKeys

username.description: Azure DevOps username or organization name.

azurerepos.description: Credentials for authenticating with Azure DevOps repositories.
azurerepos.title: AzureReposSecurityKeys

allOf.description: Azure Storage credentials for authenticating with Azure Blob Storage or Azure Files.
allOf.title: AzureSecurityKeys

azure_entra.description: Azure Entra ID (formerly Azure Active Directory) credentials for service principal authentication.
azure_entra.title: AzureEntraKeys

password.description: Container registry password or access token.

registry.description: Container registry server URL (e.g., docker.io, quay.io, or custom registry domain).

container-reg.description: Container registry credentials for authenticating with container registries including AWS ECR, Docker Hub, and Google Artifact Registry.
container-reg.title: ContainerRegistryKeys

workDir.description: Working directory path for the Tower Agent.

shared.description: Whether the agent connection is shared across multiple workspaces.

tw-agent.description: Tower Agent credentials for connecting to HPC compute environments without an SSH client.
tw-agent.title: AgentSecurityKeys

certificate.description: Base64-encoded client certificate for Kubernetes authentication.

privateKey.description: Base64-encoded private key for Kubernetes authentication.

k8s.description: Kubernetes credentials for authenticating with Kubernetes clusters.
k8s.title: K8sSecurityKeys

google.description: Google Cloud credentials for authenticating with Google Cloud Platform services.
google.title: GoogleSecurityKeys

password.description: Bitbucket app password or personal access token.

bitbucket.description: Bitbucket credentials for authenticating with Bitbucket Cloud or Bitbucket Server repositories.
bitbucket.title: BitBucketSecurityKeys

gitea.description: Gitea credentials for authenticating with self-hosted Gitea repositories.
gitea.title: GiteaSecurityKeys

assumeRoleArn.description: IAM role ARN to assume when using these credentials (optional).

allOf.description: AWS credentials for authenticating with Amazon Web Services. Supports IAM access keys, session tokens, and assume role configuration.
allOf.title: AwsSecurityKeys

codecommit.description: AWS CodeCommit credentials for authenticating with AWS CodeCommit repositories.
codecommit.title: CodeCommitSecurityKeys

token.description: GitLab personal access token (alternative to username/password).

password.description: GitLab personal access token or password.

gitlab.description: GitLab credentials for authenticating with GitLab repositories and API (GitLab.com or self-hosted).
gitlab.title: GitLabSecurityKeys
